You were six year old David, a typical boy with blond hair and green eyes. You were laying on the couch one day reading a book. You had heard over the news lately of a new virus that was effecting kids of a younger age but your mommy always pushed you out of the room when those stories came on.

You were almost done with your book when there came a hammering knock on your door. Your mommy opened it and you saw Mrs. Drant standing on your porch, a scared look on her face.

"Liz, what's wrong?" You mommy asked.

"It's Jake, he was exposed to the virus!" Mrs. Drant shouted. It was then you started to hear loud crashes and other noises from across the street. Looking out the window you saw your best friend Jake growing out of his house. His head was already pushing through the roof, and he had a happy grin on his face. As the roof crumbled to the ground Jake's peepee pushed its way through the front wall.

Then further down the block you spotted your girlfriend Sally also growing out of her house, her parents and sisters desperately escaping through the back door as the blond stepped through the front wall. At the opposite end of the street a five year old girl was sobbing as she grew out of her cloths.

"David, where are you?!" Your mommy called into the living room.

However what would happen if instead of Teenagers were just young kids that happen to stumble with that Orange stuff the Kid made, And what would happen if at the end when trying to shrink them back to normal size something had backfired and cause them the giant kids to grow even further!
1523332221.title: Village of the Giants?

choices: Pouring the tiny kids Chemicals to make him GROW
I don't know how to mix chemicals and my parents wont let me play with it, Next
15233322212.content:
(Wait what?) is what you might be thinking.
Why a movie that its main theme is Shrinking instead of Growing?

Well to anyone that happen to see the movie, knows theres a twist at the end, Sure its entire story of the movie is about the Mother/Wife accidentally mix chemicals of different products house cleaning an some new untested chemicals of some company, only to begin shrinking and shrink as the days or weeks pass by till finally shrinking to the point of a speck or germ size.

However at nearing the end an accident happens again were once more chemicals were drop and pour into the area that she was still at causing her to grow back to her normal size, And this what the ending twist shows, is that the woman after days returning back to her original size comes back home to her loving family and husband everthing seems to have return to normal to her till, her husband try to put her wedding ring on her finger but find out it can't fit anymore.

then she hears small sounds of tearing on her shoes, and realized she still growing and it ends with credits popping out where her shoe keep tearing more and more.
______________
So yeah ever since that taunt at the ending always made me want to see a continuation of that story.

So our story begins at the end of the movie, in which The boy or girl shrink to much to the point to be too small for the naked eye, Only to them being bathed once more by different chemicals reversing the effects and slowly returns to his/her normal size

However the story will continue forward and the kid will continue to grow and Grow till everyone would be the size of a speck to him/her to even see.

info.brief_description: Kids begin growing in various ways and having their way with the world
info.description:
The return of one of my favorite interactives. Original was taken down for reasons I never learned, so I wanted to restart it here. All the thanks to the original author.

Rules:

1) Only those under 13 can grow. No giant/ess teenagers

2) Clothing does not grow with the kids. It just doesn't make sense it would

3) Please make each chapter at least 5 sentences. Any chapters with less will be given a chance to lengthen them, or I will alter them if not.

4) Have Fun!
